# User Story

## User Story Title

_As a_ [role],
_I want_ [feature description],
_so that_ [expected benefit or reason].

## Acceptance Criteria

1. **Given** [initial condition],
   **When** [action performed],
   **Then** [expected outcome].

2. **Given** [initial condition],
   **When** [action performed],
   **Then** [expected outcome].
